recipe_name: Almond dipping sauce with pitta bread fingers
author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the almond butter, lemon juice and oil into a bowl and mix well. Cut the pitta bread into fingers and serve with the almond dipping sauce.
ingredients: 3 tbsp almond butter, from a jar,  Â½ lemon, juice only,  1 tbsp vegetable oil,  2 wholemeal pitta breads, toasted, to serve
